page.title: 08EGGINTON CHURCH
page.content: Egginton has just had a new Rector. His name is Mr.Short he lives in Etwall.The key is kept next door to the church.There are 28 pews and can seat about 250 people.There are 3 bells two on the back.The services are on Sundays 9am till 10am and 3pm till 4pm.The oldest grave is inside the Church dated 1715.The doors have grouted diamond shapes at each side.The west pulpit is constructed of some ancient oak from Egginton Hall in honour of Sir Edward and Lady Every,for their 25th wedding aniversary 1909-1934.
